metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11157 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Improper conditions check in voltage settings for some Intel(R) Processors may allow a privileged user to potentially enable escalation of privilege and/or information disclosure via local access.

notes.Note: sbeattie> research may call the issue "thundervolt"

criterions.comment: intel-microcode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
